=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
RATING: 6
Fun and silly.  Surprisingly Galaxy Trucker was quite a chore to learn in the beginning, but after getting pass the initial rules hump, there were quite a bit to like about this game.  Although it was encouraged to build a well rounded ship suitable for any encounters, this task became almost impossible with the timed and competitive nature of the construction phase.  For me, half of the fun was to see people's ship getting blown to bits little by little.  However, I was concerned at the replayability of Galaxy Trucker, because after just 3 rounds, I found myself slightly bored of seeing the same cards being flipped over (honestly, pirates was the only one I hoped for by then).  One other thing I didn't like was how the lead ship tended to end up as the cannon fodder.  Once it is damaged and have no proper resources to complete most of the encounters, it will then continue to stay ahead (while the others fall behind because they are delayed by exploring abandoned station, picking up cargoes, etc) and continue to be the first (and sometimes the only one) to get pounded at.  Either we missed a rule somewhere, or that just seemed completely unfair and broken.  Anyway, not a bad game to play once in a while, but it wouldn't be something I'd ask for often.
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
RATING: 6
Building your spaceship is the fun part, flying it is a bit of an anticlimax.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
RATING: 6
A very frustrating game for me. I don't like time pressure in these types of games, and Galaxy Trucker is one of the worst in this department. First is all time pressure, next is a lot of luck. There is definitely strategy, but I can't seem to grasp it. Try as I might, I can't bring myself to enjoy this game, despite its awesome theme.
I also find Chvatil's games to be a slapdash amalgamation of bizarre mechanics smushed together, and this one is no exception. It feels like 2 separate games were fused together into one which is less than the sum of its parts.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
RATING: 9
This games simple rocks. I love it. I hate it. I am awesome at it. I am terrible at it. That pretty much sums up Galaxy Trucker. I have never had so many different emotions while playing a game. It's just plain simple fun. I also recently got my non gamer brother and his wife to play this and they LOVED it. Never thought of it as an "entry" level game and probably won't recommend it as such but it worked great for them. They were blown away by how unique this game is. WARNING: This game is not to be taken serious. If you take it serious it will NOT be fun. Your ship WILL blow up at some point on some play through. You will LOSE parts of it. You will probably lose a lot of it. Smile and keep on trucking!

RATING: 8
After one play, I think this game is brilliant.  Clever and unique; I had a lot of fun.

I suspect my rating will drop a little bit after a couple of more cutthroat games; I just want my ship to be complete and well-designed too badly, and I know I'm going to get frustrated against experienced/quick-thinking players.

Update: Still a 9.  This game is brilliant, clever, unique, and a lot of fun.

Update: Okay, dropping a little bit for fiddliness and randomness.

RATING: 9

RATING: 10
Vlaada is a genius. You build a space ship out of tiles that you try to fit together, and not turn by turn, but everyone grabs tiles at the same time, and everything is on a timer. When all are done, you draw cards to see what kind of dangers you'll encounter, and you hope for the ship to hold together. Absolutely amazing. Played countless times.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
RATING: 8
Build your own spaceship and see it blasted to pieces while you race it against other players spaceships. 
The fun part is the building of your ship. It's connecting the right pieces while everyone is on a timer.Have a laugh at other players dreadfull creations.
Building the ships takes some skill but can be stressfull (in a pleasant way). The second part tests your ship by throwing problems at it. It has some luck, but the best ship has a good chance of scoring the best.

It took some plays before the game clicked. But it's certainly amusing, fun and a fresh concept.

RATING: 9
Build a spaceship out of junk and attempt to fly it across the galaxy in one piece while avoiding meteor storms, slavers and war zones. Simply brilliant game that requires a sense of humour and ability to laugh at your own misfortune.

Theme: Sci-fi space trucking
Mechanic: Tile placement / dice rolling
Ideal players 2-4
Length: Medium

RATING: 8.8
银河卡车是少有的另类桌游创作，玩家需要在一定时间内拼装自己的飞船，然后经历宇宙空间各种事件的考验，到达终点卖出货物赚到宇宙币。规则上简单容易上手，玩家的观察，反应，策略三者需面面俱到，再加上一点点运气才能获得胜利。当然，游戏中还一部分乐趣来自于幸灾惹祸，看着竞争对手支离破碎的船体想必也是一件无比美妙的事情。
【关键词】沙漏，拼图，玩家顺位，宇航员与外星人，火炮/引擎/护盾/能源，八类事件，裸露连接，正反左右打击，奖励与惩罚

【推荐度】中高【时间拼图竞逐，轻中度美式爱好者
